  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114626</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114626</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sliding of atomic planes during plastic deformation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schieben der Atomflächen während der 
Plastikdeformation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Glissement des avions atomiques pendant la 
déformation en plastique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deslizamento de planos atômicos durante a 
deformação plástica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Facendo scorrere degli aerei atomici durante la 
deformazione di plastica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ολίσθηση των ατομικών αεροπλάνων κατά τη διάρκεια της
πλαστικής παραμόρφωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El resbalar de planos atómicos durante la 
deformación plástica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how planes of atoms slide past each other when a metal undergoes plastic deformation. The planes along which this occurs are called slip planes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atomic plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastic deformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sliding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slip plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Flächen der Atome 
hinter einander schieben, wenn ein Metall Plastikdeformation 
durchmacht. Die Flächen, entlang denen diese auftritt, werden 
Belegflächen genannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment les plans des 
atomes glissent après l'un l'autre quand un métal subit la 
déformation en plastique. Les avions le long dont ceci se 
produit sont appelés des avions de glissade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como os planos dos 
átomos deslizam após se quando um metal se submete à deformação 
plástica. Os planos ao longo de que este ocorre são chamados 
planos do deslizamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come i piani degli 
atomi fanno scorrere oltre a vicenda quando un metallo subisce la 
deformazione di plastica. Gli aerei lungo cui questo si presenta
sono chiamati aerei di slittamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς τα αεροπλάνα των 
ατόμων γλιστρούν το ένα μετά από το άλλο όταν υποβάλλεται ένα
μέταλλο στην πλαστική παραμόρφωση. Τα αεροπλάνα κατά μήκος
των οποίων αυτό εμφανίζεται καλούνται γλιστρούν τα αεροπλάνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo los planos de 
átomos resbalan más allá de uno a cuando un metal experimenta la 
deformación plástica. Los planos a lo largo de los cuales 
éste ocurre se llaman los planos del resbalón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atomfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plastikdeformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schieben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belegfläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avion atomique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">déformation en plastique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">glissement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avion de glissade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">plano atômico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deformação plástica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslizamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">plano do deslizamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aereo atomico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">deformazione di plastica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fare scorrere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aereo di slittamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ατομικό αεροπλάνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλαστική παραμόρφωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ολίσθηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αεροπλάνο ολίσθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plano atómico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plano del resbalón</string>
          </keyword>
